title: ICanHelpYou6 is a spambot/Chat privileges for level 1s
body: Another Level 1 account telling me I need another person to pretend to be me to feel better about myself. Can we get chat privileges restricted to Level 2's and up? I feel like that would solve this problem.

replies.body:
I have had friend requests from this bot 3 times this week.
why isn't there a block option on friend requests?

Makes me giggle every time I realise people actually pay money for this.

But anyway, something like this should be sent as a support ticket to Riot, not a post on the boards. We can't really do anything effective about it.

There's literally no point in reporting this guy, He'll just come back with another name and start spreading the links. I know from past experience; I've had the exact same message sent to me 12 Times in a row in the space of 2 Days. So that's why i never accept friend requests anymore.
